When a model learns from too few data points

Generative AI.answer: Balanced training between the generator and discriminator

Generative AI.question: What is the role of the 'discriminator' in GANs?
options: To evaluate the authenticity of the generated data
To reduce the dimensionality of data
Generative AI.answer: To evaluate the authenticity of the generated data
